mapper.select: SELECT id, name, district from fileInfos WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO fileInfos(scanId, hashValue, filePath, dirName, fileName, fileExt, size, created, modified, owner, archived) VALUES(#{scanId}, #{hashValue}, #{filePath}, #{dirName}, #{fileName}, #{fileExt}, #{size}, #{created}, #{modified}, #{owner}, #{archived})
mapper.update: UPDATE fileInfos SET name=#{name}, district =#{district} WHERE id =#{id}
